data.title: List of African American newspapers in Virginia

Hampton The True Southerner 1865 1866 Weekly

LCCN sn93059185

OCLC 27480413

Free online archive

Started by white army officer in 1865, but taken over by Joseph T. Wilson in 1866.

Moved to Norfolk in 1866.[33] Printing presses smashed by white mob in Norfolk later that year.

Lynchburg Counselor and Herald 1892? ? Weekly Lynchburg First Class 1984 ? Bimonthly newspaper Lynchburg Interpreter 1903 1906

Founded by Robert W. Goff.

Only African American paper in Lynchburg in first decade of 1900s.
